channel.title: If you make a new moparscape account
channel.description: My friend tried to make an account for himself, but it didnt work. So then, I went ahead and tried to make him one with my email address. The problem is, niether of us got a verification email (we even checked out spam box). Does this happen with anyone else?

item.title: If you make a new moparscape account
item.dc:creator: @WiZzLe WiZzLe
item.description:
@WiZzLe wrote:

Pff, a mod told me I wasn’t to create more than 1 mopar account a while ago =\ and maybe you should just directly contact (PM) moparisthebest to fix it.

Read full topic

item.description:

its a strange problem at the moment, but i dont know if its being looked into. but it should be fixed in no time, but if it doesnt, make new email addresses and try them, to see if it works.

It DOES work on hotmail
Doesnt usually work on yahoo[br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2007, 01:10:27 PM[/size][hr]If it DOESNT work on hotmail upgrade to Windows Live Mail and check it
